## clearCachedScreenReaderText() function

Clears any locally cached screen reader text for the given instance of selenium-webdriver.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function clearCachedScreenReaderText(webdriver: WebdriverLike): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  webdriver | [WebdriverLike](./assistive-webdriver.webdriverlike.md) | reference to the selenium-webdriver instance |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
